a: After you pay, you will receive an email with instructions. I will ask for your assets (videos, images) and the highlight (the most important things about your listing). Even better if you have a link to your listing.

q: What if I don’t like the video?
a: No worries! We’ll continue to revise the design until you’re 100% satisfied.

q: How fast will I receive my video?
a: On average, most requests are completed in just a few days. The best way to save time is to make sure I have all the information and assets ready.

You might be surprised to hear this, but SonicBoomMedia is an agency of one. This means you’ll work directly with me, founder of SonicBoomMedia. However, power-up requests such as filming and taking picture are provided by partners.
I use several tools. The most common ones are iMovie and Invideo.

q: Are there any refunds if I don’t like the service?
a: Due to the high-quality nature of the work, there will be no refunds issued.
